name: The Gumbo Garden
description:
The Gumbo Garden is the finest restaurant in New Orleans. Its famous gumbo pot has been stewing away since 1957! Keep the pot alive by picking ingredients from the garden and placing them in the stockpot. Be sure to keep the ingredients balanced! If one runs out, customers will not pay as much for your gumbo!

Use the arrow keys or [WASD] to move

Use [Space] to pick ingredients from plants. Plants that grow large fill your pot more quickly!

Carry the ingredients to the pot, then go find some more!

Gumbo Garden is an entry to Ludum Dare 46. Thanks for playing!
